dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes historical notes. Probably issued in: A compleat body of ancient geography, both sacred and profane ... / by the learned G. Hornius. Printed at The Hague : and sold by T. Osborne ... London, 1741.
dct_publisher_sm: [Printed at The Hague : and sold by T. Osborne ... London, 1741]
